caption.title: SDS page of concentrated saliva and purified saliva IgG.
caption.p: Lanes 1–8 show micro-filtrated (5μm and 0.45μm) and concentrated saliva (~ 8μg total protein). The Std lane shows the protein ladder (10, 15, 25, 35, 55, 70, 100, 130 and 250kDa). The IgG std is a commercial human IgG standard (2μg). Lanes 11–16 show IgG purified from saliva (~ 2.5μg total protein). Lane 17 shows BSA (1μg total protein).
